Author: whitleylights
Text: Yes one of my closest friends is like that! It's so frustrating because I know she's doing it out of love but it makes me feel awful. I feel more guilty about eating than upsetting her though.   I have another close friend with an ED and the two of us actually have a really healthy and supportive friendship. Of course, we get concerned for each other, but we don't pressure each other into doing anything.
